kubejs.title: Lucky World Invasion
server_entry.title: Need a server?
server_entry.description: Click me to get your own server!
tooltip.kubejs.lucky_gem_pickaxe: Mine the event lucky blocks, a new lucky block of the same type will be generated in place within a short period of time
tooltip.kubejs.lucky_gem_pickaxe_imitati: Mine the event lucky blocks, trigger events
tooltip.kubejs.challenge_badge: Complete the challenge quest to obtain
tooltip.kubejs.bad_apple: Increase difficulty based on the player's current difficulty value
message.kubejs.login.text.1: , you can find the quest book in the upper left corner of the inventory screen.
message.kubejs.difficulty.reduce: You have died, the difficulty automatically decreases by %s!
message.kubejs.dimensions.limit.text: You need to reach %s difficulty to enter this dimension!
message.kubejs.event.position_ex: We will exchange positions with a player on the server in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.position_tp: It will be transmitted to the location of a player on the server in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.explosion: Worried about TNT above your head in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.mob: Monsters will be generated nearby in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.lava: Lava will form under your feet in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.lightning: Lightning will be spawn under your feet in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.gift: A gift will fall in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.difficulty: The difficulty will increase in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.invasion: A night invasion will be added in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.snow: Powder snow will form under your feet in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.cobweb: Cobweb will be spawn near the player in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.potion: It will have a negative effect on you in %s seconds!
message.kubejs.event.server.cancel: The automatic consumption of lucky blocks canceled the event!
message.kubejs.item.bad_apple: You have used a %s, the difficulty has increased by %s!
tooltip.yakurum.tnt_wand: Right click to launch ignited TNT
tooltip.yakurum.curse_sword: Apply a significant amount of negative effects to the target
tooltip.yakurum.night_sword: The holder gains Swift II, which applies Blindness and Darkness to the target
tooltip.yakurum.launcher_sword: Apply a brief Launch III effect to the target
